title: S8E09 – "What Evil Lurks" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Christa Carmen, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about graveside gifts, ominous organs, disturbing dreams, and odd automatons.

                     

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
